summary: This tutorial covers Font Awesome 5Design Icons concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Font Awesome 5Design Icons effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Font Awesome 5Design Icons and how to apply it in your projects.
